labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The arrow is tiny and in the lower right-hand corner of the box, disproportionate to the actual box and other symbols/characters of the interface.
data.expected_result: The arrow should be larger and in the middle of the box.
data.short_description: Selecting options to customize an invite's duration or number of usages has a tiny, misplaced arrow.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have permission to create an invite for the server (either through administrator or create invite permission). - Click the gear to customize options. - Select an option from "expire after" or "max number of uses". - Observe that the arrow is tiny and located in the lower right-hand corner.
